sprite.name: Move-when-on Metal Block [UNUSED]
sprite.notes: A tall block with a lava glow underneath it that will move at any point when a specified number of 'passengers' (players + enemies) are standing on it, then goes back to the original position.

list.title: Size
list.comment: This determines the size of the block.

list.title: Moves with Passenger Number
list.comment: This determines how many 'passengers' are needed for the block's movement to activate. Only seems to work with players with current research.

list.title: Direction
list.comment: This determines which direction the block will move while moving.

value.title: Speed
value.comment: This determines how quickly the block will move while moving.
